Notes: The main collectible in most levels. A Power Star usually represents one specific scenario. When collecting it, a short cutscene will be played. If this object is a Grand Star and the current galaxy is VsKoopaLv3Galaxy, Peach will appear during the Star Get cutscene.

Obj_arg0.Name: Power Star ID
Obj_arg0.Description: The scenario to which this Power Star belongs. Should be a valid ID.

Obj_arg1.Name: Unknown 1
Obj_arg1.Description: Related to gravity during appearance cutscene.

Obj_arg2.Name: Ignores Gravity?
Obj_arg2.Description: If set, its pose won't be affected by gravity and is instead specified by the initial rotation.

Obj_arg3.Name: Elliptic Cylinder Shadow?
Obj_arg3.Description: If set, an elliptic cylinder will be used as its shadow model instead of an ellipsoid.

Obj_arg5.Name: Shadow Length
Obj_arg5.Description: Sets the shadow drop length. Default is 1000.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

Group.Description: Used to group this object with other PowerStarAppearPoint instances. If the Power Star appears, it will spawn at the instance that the player is closest to. Limit is 16 objects per group. This does not work when spawned after defeating most bosses or after collecting all Purple Coins.

GeneralPos.Description: スターゲットデモ座標 can be used to specify the position and rotation of its Star Get cutscene.

Camera.Description: Used when the Power Star appears.

DemoCast.Description: The object takes part in the cutscene. It can use two special cutscene nerves for the cutscenes ミニ太陽消失 and グランドスター復活.

MirrorActor.Description: A mirrored version of this object is created for mirror reflection setups if placed inside a MirrorArea.

DemoSimpleCast.Description: This object will not pause its movement during cutscenes, NPC conversations, etc. Only supported in HoneyBeeVillageGalaxy2, MokumokuValleyGalaxy2, TwisterTowerGalaxy3 and UndergroundDangeonGalaxy2.
